trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_000<tab>Oh, a new drone has fluttered into the Beehive! But are you sure that your patron won't mind?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_010<tab>Back for some more “High or Low,” are we? I knew you'd be unable to resist...

TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_020<tab>Oh my, you are a naughty one sneaking back in here just to see me. I heard you'd stirred up quite the hornet's nest. And you look ever so uneasy... How about a little game to relieve some of that tension?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_040<tab>I'm sorry, little drone... My head is all...foggy.

TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_050<tab>Though the world may be falling down around us, there's no reason to deprive ourselves of life's pleasures. Can I tempt you with a little game, my dear?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_060<tab>Most people buzz about during the day, whereas I am a creature of the night. After all, the best games are played after dark, wouldn't you agree?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_Q1_000_500<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_A1_000_501<tab>Let's play “High or Low”!
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_A1_000_502<tab>Maybe another time.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_A1_000_503<tab>What are the rules?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_510<tab>“High or Low” is a guessing game. You must decide whether the total of your three cards is higher or lower than the total of your opponent's cards.

TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_511<tab>The deck holds nine cards, with the pictures printed thereon representing the numbers one through nine. Each number appears only once in the deck, so there are no repeats.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_512<tab>If you guess correctly, then you win the match. If both totals are the same, then another hand is dealt.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_520<tab>Oh, you mustn't tease me like that... If you change your mind, my naughty little drone, I'll be waiting.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_530<tab>Come then, honeybee. Let's have some fun.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_531<tab>Three cards for you, three cards for me. You flip one of yours over, and I flip two of mine.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_532<tab>Now, what's your call? Will your total be higher or lower than mine?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_Q2_000_533<tab>I choose...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_A2_000_534<tab>Low!
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_A2_000_535<tab>High!
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_536<tab>You're going with “low,” then? Right, let's see what we've got...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_537<tab>You're going with “high,” then? Right, let's see what we've got...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_538<tab>My cards add up to <var 20 E802 /var>. And you have...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_539<tab>...a total of <var 20 E802 /var>.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_540<tab>Congratulations, your guess was right!
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_541<tab>Well, it seems luck was on your side. Or perhaps it was more than that...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_100_541<tab>How does victory taste? Sweet as nectar, yes?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_110_541<tab>So, our little game ends with you on top...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_Q3_120_541<tab>Can I tempt you with another game?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_130_541<tab>Stay with me a while longer, my dear.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_140_541<tab>So you wish to end on a high note? Perfectly understandable.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_542<tab>Aw... Sorry, honeybee, but this match goes to me.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_Q4_000_543<tab>Shall we play again?
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_544<tab>That's what I like to hear. Let me shuffle the deck...
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_545<tab>Had enough for now? Fine, fine─I'll be sitting right here should the mood strike you.
TEXT_REGNOR4TISTABIE_00612_TISTABIE_000_546<tab>Oho, it seems we came out equal. But as lovely a coincidence as that may be, we still need a clear winner...
